data.what_is: Maropost simplifies customer engagement with a unified email marketing platform that connects companies with their customers at every step of their journey. Providing a single customer view, Maropost creates personalized experiences across any channel for better engagement and higher conversion. Pairing white-glove service with industry-leading technology, Maropost makes customer engagement easy.
data.product_description: Maropost's on-demand digital marketing platforms help you turn prospects into clients by ensuring delivery of targeted messaging to the right contact at the right time.If you're interested in a scalable email marketing platform like Maropost, here are a few questions to ask yourself:1. Will this tool meet my requirements for connectivity? Smart touchpoints are critical for keeping your programs up and running and tend to be the most complex part of making the switch.2. Can it scale for both volume and capability? If you're looking for a long-term solution, you want something that can grow with your team.3. Will I have relentless customer support? Technical support is fine, but things like a smooth implementation process, ensuring your email deliverability rates always exceed expectations, and having a trusted resource when your team needs to scale up are important.4. Does this solution advance my customer engagement strategy? If you're going to go through the pain of switching providers, don't make a lateral move just to satisfy what your program needs today.

If you're going to go through the pain of switching providers, don't make a lateral move just to satisfy what your program needs today.Seller DetailsSellerMaropost, IncPhone1-888-438-3152 -ext. 101Year Founded2011HQ LocationToronto, CanadaTwitter@Maropost23,240 Twitter followersLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.com393 employees on LinkedIn(r)DescriptionMaropost is a cloud-based revenue optimization suite that gives companies the ability to increase multi-channel customer engagement to maximize revenue. Through integrated marketing and sales automation, Maropost provides essential tools, strategic guidance and support needed to create more personalized customer experiences through a 360-degree business view - from marketing automation to CRM, commerce, and customer support. Headquartered in Toronto, Canada with development offices in Chandigarh, India, Maropost is trusted by 300 brands like New York Post, DigitalMarketer, Golden State Warriors, Warby Parker, Shop.com and Mercedes-Benz.MMOverview Provided by:Maropost Marketing

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools

all_reviews.review_title: Great interface, helpful for delivering content and sales messages to prospects.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
I love the segmentation and email deliverability insights.  Being able to target in on our most active customers, based on how recent they've been added to the maropost platform and/or purchased... how much money they've spent with us as a customer.. and how frequent they purchase our products or services, really helps us to continue to increase our sales.  Plus maropost makes it easy to add and edit html content to communicate with our buyers as much as we do, usually twice a day- sometimes more and to different segments.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
I dislike not being able to send to a list and a brand in the same campaign.  It makes it difficult because we send to different brands based on user engagement BUT we're sending the same content.  Would make scheduling emails half as time consuming to be able to have the ability to send one campaign to two different brands at the same time.

Recommendations to others considering Maropost Marketing Cloud:
Consider how often you email and how big a role email revenue plays in your business.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been able to connect buyers into our list on Maropost to create automatic campaigns to further communicate, monetize, and support our customers.  Also, it takes a while to set up segments based on uses who clicked certain emails over a time range. Because to create that segment, we have to go in and figure out who clicked on each email in each campaign.  And then go back to delete campaigns and criteria in the segment so that we can keep these clicker segments updated with recent clickers.

all_reviews.review_content:

Being relatively easy to use, Maropost is also easy to train other members of our team on. It's also very easy to pull in different lists and create separate journeys as we often will add a one off cadence on top of a five-step cadence. As we often have to change the copy following a change in the agenda, it's very easy to revise the copy and upload the new one.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
We have run into some issues with people uploading the incorrect list to Maropost while this is mostly human error, it would be great if there is a safeguard here to protect us.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
Maropost have revolutionized the ways that we are reaching out to members of our community. It has also made it very easy for people to unsubscribe to our emails if they choose to. It also makes it very easy to load journeys and change copy as needed rather than needing to create an entirely new journey each time the copy has been changed.

all_reviews.review_title: Great starter ESP with plenty of functionality
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
Maropost provides a good amount of analytics for emails sent, their support is consistent and easily accessible and their WYSIWYG functionality for emails and landing pages works relatively well. They're quick to add features (so make sure you utilize the 'request a feature' forum). Once you get the hang of things it's pretty easy to create anything you want.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
The UX isn't great. It takes a while to get used to some of the navigation, and there are some ongoing annoyances that don't impact overall functionality, but are frustrating. Everything needs to be scheduled in EST, and when creating lists/content/campaigns what you're creating will go t the main parent folder and not into the folder you're currently working in. It's also important to note that all 'Lists' are subscriptions, so when your contact goes to their 'manage preferences' page they can see all of the lists they're enrolled in, so make use of segmentation rather than multiple list uploads if you can.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
Maropost is functioning as our ESP, we are automating more emails and utilizing their forms and landing pages to create more specialized email sign up campaigns. We are also running ongoing welcome drips and re-engagement drips to keep our lists clean and healthy.

They're on-the-fly landing pages are great for quick promotions. Their API structure allows code to be developed for tasks like integrating with a predictive dialing software.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
They need to update their SMS capabilities to meet the stringent US requirements. Additionally, you need a dedicated person to dive deep into the platform to really make use of all its capabilities. You'll sell yourself short without the proper training and time devoted to the platform.

Recommendations to others considering Maropost Marketing Cloud:
Look into Maropost. It offers many features that others don't. And, their API feature makes it very customizable.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are an agency that handles multiple client's email. Their are many products out there to choose from, however Maropost offers a sound solution with all the data management and reporting requirements. A big plus is their journey capabilities which allows the user to visually create complex campaigns with multiple operands i.e. if this, then this, etc. This allows us to create a campaign with multiple actions from start to finish.

all_reviews.review_title: New platform with a lot of kinks to be worked out
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
I like how simplified everything is. Needs to be more intuitive of an interface but the idea of simplifying the platform versus a complicated platform like Salesforce is needed.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
The dynamic content. The whole process with the builder and how you have to go through some roundabout way of creating new content with the WYSIWIG, then drop in a short code, then highlight the short code then click the dynamic builder....this sucks. There should be a simple main nav link to take you to all dynamic content in a library or something and then it should be easily editable. OR, you could allow AMP script or something so dynamic content could be handled with pure HTML and not force people to use the builder.

Recommendations to others considering Maropost Marketing Cloud:
If you're not a developer and want something simple then this is for you. If you're a dev/tech person then this platform has a lot of shortfalls.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We need automated journey mapping so that we can further automate our email process and make it more relevant to our users. This platform helps that although requires quite a learning curve.

all_reviews.review_title: Pretty good, with a few limitations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
The overlay / email summary is helpful, knowing details like the open rate, click rate, location, etc. The "render preview" option is super helpful as well, and seems accurate. We like being able to edit our own code easily & being able to schedule journeys. A/B testing option is good.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
Online support is limited (competitors like MailChimp has a lot more information available online). Chat support isn't always helpful either - we get a lot of "it's something wrong on your end," which may be true, but isn't super helpful regardless. Journeys require we enter emoji shortcode, instead of selecting from the emoji menu (shown in regular campaigns). There no support for sms: code. We wish we could do standard formatting for the integrated "view in browser" option for each client. Our integration with google analytics is not currently working, so we have to amend a utm string to every link in order to insure tracking. Grouping is tricky - the little gray tab on the left is VERY hard to find. I wish support for personalization was easier ot integrate.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We like being able to schedule journey emails, which reduces the work on our end (and client's end). We can keep in front of customers, and track their open rates and clicks.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
Good account management and granular permissions. It's easy to switch between the different brands I work on.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
The reporting is terrible. When I export campaigns from a date range, I only want to export campaigns SENT in that date range, not every campaign that has activity in that date range. The report exporting is extremely slow. Data visualization in Maropost is next to nothing, so I have to export all the data and create visualizations in Excel.

Recommendations to others considering Maropost Marketing Cloud:
Ask a lot of questions about the reporting capabilities.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm not really sure, as I was not involved in the selection process.

We are solving the issue of Spam blockers, list hygiene, and click-through/open rates. We have realized, through Maropost deliverability analytics, the many filters that ISPs put up for old emails. We are able to segment our users by open rates and improve our IP reputation with these functions.

all_reviews.review_title: Maropost is a strong platform with a good outlook, but a few blind spots
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
The automation tool is by far the most powerful aspect of the platform. It's extremely powerful, feature rich and easy to use. This is undoubtedly where Maropost made a name for themselves. I wish it had SMS and Push notifications included, but it doesn't. As far as email-related automations go, I don't think it's missing anything. It has contact-level tagging which is very important when doing marketing automation.

Other big plusses: segmentation, easy dynamic content, innovative delivery tools, web tracking script, landing page builder/form builder, blacklist checker in email sending workflow, and a really easy way to select/exclude lists during the message creation process.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
I don't like how you have to create content in a separate area from the message creation workflow. This is a little cumbersome. It's the same with their multi-variant testing tool, it's time consuming to manually create many pieces of content before running the test.

I also think the UI has quite a few quirks and bugs. Strange menu layouts etc, but this goes for all email platforms. It just takes a bit of acclimation and fine tuning.

Lastly, although people seem to rave about their customer support, I have had the opposite experience. Not very helpful, short tempered, untruthful, pushy, and very sales-quota oriented.

Recommendations to others considering Maropost Marketing Cloud:
Go through a very thorough evaluation. The initial answers their team gives you are not always trustworthy. On repeated occasions they have either blatantly mislead me or highly exaggerated what the platform can do.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for a more forward thinking, agile, innovative platform, instead of the older, legacy products we had been using for years. These older products just weren't innovating, whereas Maropost was really disrupting the scene with cutting edge features being shipped at a very fast pace.

And deliverability has been top notch! We have had little to no issues with our emails reaching the inbox.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?

Our company relies completely on email, and therefore we need a solution that we can trust.

Maropost has been that solution for us, delivering top notch customer support, and deliverability.

Of course an added benefit we've found has been the simplicity of testing our email program. Anything from subject lines, all the way to complete automated series' can be tested faster than we've ever been able to with previous solutions.

We couldn't be happier with the results we have seen from Maropost.

all_reviews.review_title: I Will Name My First Born "Maropost"
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
The best thing about Maropost is the people behind the platform.

I can't count how many times I've come to them with a problem only to get it quickly resolved.

Plus Ross is a pretty hands on CEO, not shying away from customers.

For example I recently met up with Ross at a conference and asked him how we could accomplish setting up a button in our emails that allows readers to adjust the numbers of emails they get from us.

At first the answer wasn't apparent either of us, but Ross and I spent about 8 minutes to think it through and come up with a solution.

Second to that would be the increase in deliverability from what we were using before.

And third would be how easy it is to login and create segmented Autoresponder sequences.

Overall, if you're serious about upping your email game you'd be crazy to go with anyone else other than Maropost.

Thanks Ross and Team!

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
At first I didn't like how there wasn't much documentation on how things worked. But over the past year, the team at Maropost has come along way and have been a great help.

That's the only complaint I can really think of.

Sure there have been minor issues in the past, however I get those quickly resolved by just emailing support@maropost.com.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our primary focus with email is getting the right message to the right customer at the right time. This way we can drive our engagement up and maintain that valuable brand real estate in the minds of our customers and prospects.

Maropost is helping us with that on all fronts. Especially when it comes to deliverability and segmentation.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
Maropost is incredibly simple, fast, and straight up works. It was very easy to migrate to, setup, and immediately start sending emails. And their customer service is incredibly helpful -- unlike some other companies.

For example, when we got started, their postmaster and their livechat support staff were there every step of the way to make sure that our e-mail settings were setup properly, our deliverability challenges were taken care of, and they even got us certified with ReturnPath. Other companies should take note of the accessibility of Maropost's customer support, for sure.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
There are some features missing that I'd love to be added, however, it seems as if they add in new features every week, so they should get caught up soon!

They have all of the basic features that are necessary for you to send out e-mails - the only thing missing is some more advanced segmentation like infusionsoft - but that is not mandatory for me.

Recommendations to others considering Maropost Marketing Cloud:
If you're on a shared server and your list is over 100,000, I'd recommend Maropost. If you're not having deliverability issues now, you will eventually, and you will be screwed on shared email hosting.

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're able to easily e-mail our large e-mail list, and have set ourselves up for long term solid deliverability through Maropost. E-mail has been harder and harder to get delivered, and I believe that Maropost will set us up properly for the long term.

The biggest thing is that I've learned quite a bit about e-mail/list hygiene and deliverability, so even if one day Maropost no longer meets our requirements, my experience with them will prepare me for any other service we may try to use later down the line.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing support, great features best Gmail delivery around!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
Maropost is the perfect mix of "enterprise level" technology and "they still listen to their customers".  The software was good when we made the switch but has become GREAT in the last 6 months.  I'm pretty sure they have added almost every feature, improvement and integration I've asked for - plus several I didn't even know I wanted but couldn't live without now!

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
My main complaint is the lack of documentation and training they have available on their platform.  *BUT at the rate they're adding new features, system integrations and improvements I get it.  Plus Ross and his team have always been quick to jump on and do a personalized training session with my team.  (I'd still like some documentation ;)

What problems is Maropost Marketing Cloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
Maropost is the 9th (yep NINTH) email platform we've used in the past 10 years... we kept "outgrowing" them or the deliverability of the provider dropped or they just didn't have the features we needed to deploy our marketing campaigns effectively.

Maropost is different.

They're system gets great deliverability (especially into the Gmail primary inbox), mails go out quickly, the integrations allow us to leverage our existing shoppingcart for what they do best and then apply logic and deploy campaigns based on individual user activity in Maropost.

all_reviews.review_title: The Undisputed Leader In The Field Of Email Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
Ross Andrew, the CEO, runs a very tight ship and takes personal care of his customers. This is not to be underestimated if you value good old-fashioned customer support, something that is sadly lacking in many software solution services these days.

He also has the leading ESP platform that is ranked #1 for email deliverability. That's no mean feat and the value of it is almost priceless in today's world where it's getting harder and harder to get into the inbox of our customers and subscribers.

Also the automation and split-testing is industry leading. My particular favorite is split-testing subject lines to a portion of the list and then automatically sending the winner to the bulk of the list. This one innovation to our marketing has already more than covered our investment in Maropost.

I am also extremely impressed with the ongoing innovation of the platform and the fact that suggesting from customers are listened to and then implemented!



Give it a try and you'll see for yourself.

What do you dislike about Maropost Marketing Cloud?
Really there is so little to dislike. What they could improve on is having more video tutorials.

Recommendations to others considering Maropost Marketing Cloud:
Has the most advanced automation tools currently available in the industry AND has the best deliverability, plus it also has the best customer service experience. Definitely request a demo of the product, you won't be disappointed.

DELIVERABILITY!

Also the advanced automation tools are a real goldmine for those who want to get a better return on investment from their marketing efforts.
